definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
four horse military chariot (archaic)/four (archaic)/generic term for history books
to ride/to mount/to make use of/to avail oneself of/to take advantage of/to multiply (math.)/Buddhist sect or creed

sentences.english: The products made of well-selected wool feel soft (have a soft feel).
sentences.chinese: 用料上乘的羊毛制品，手感柔软。

sentences.english: The Kamchatka crab is, truly, the perfect product.
sentences.chinese: 堪察加的螃蟹是最上乘的产品。

sentences.english: In England, the best plums are grown in Kent and the Vale of Evesham.
sentences.chinese: 在英格兰，最上乘的李子种植在肯特和伊弗珊谷。

sentences.english: Strawberry Hill bears medium sized, pure rose pink , cupped rosettes of superb quality.
sentences.chinese: 草莓山熊中型，纯粉色，杯状花的质量上乘。

sentences.english: Wine abounds here since ancient times, which, by the middle of the Liulin Town Wine is the best.
sentences.chinese: 这里自古盛产美酒，唯以柳林镇所产之酒为上乘。

sentences.english: Several times fine grinding make couplings Excellentt quality and a beautiful outlook.
sentences.chinese: 多次精磨保证了接箍的上乘质量和精致外观。

sentences.english: Our motto is superior quality, good credit and abiding contract.
sentences.chinese: 上乘的质量，良好的信誉，信守合同是我们的宗旨。

sentences.english: Many of these stores are filled with hundreds of top quality items.
sentences.chinese: 然而一些商店却有许多质量上乘的商品。

sentences.english: This painting is of remarkable quality.
5，Your goods are superior in quality compared with those of other manufacturers.
sentences.chinese: 和其他厂商相比，贵方产品质量上乘。

sentences.english: 3Mary and I took a taxi to home from the party and split the fare.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽和我一起从晚会上乘出租车回家，车费平摊。

definition: out of the ordinary/out of the common run
